data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 1, Dallas to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
In Sandy, Dallas push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Dallas's half.
Salt Lake are pushing forward but Damir Kreilach's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 5, Dallas have a goal kick.
Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Dallas's half.
Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 9, Salt Lake drive upfield and Albert Rusnak gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Dallas defender.
Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas.
In the minute 18, Dallas apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Bressan. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Salt Lake push forward at Rio Tinto Stadium and Aaron Herrera gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dallas defence.
Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dallas's half?
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Salt Lake's Corey Baird is on target but unsuccessful.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 24, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Nedum Onuoha of Salt Lake gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick Salt Lake.
Salt Lake's Corey Baird gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dallas defender.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 31, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Salt Lake are coming forward and Douglas Martinez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Pablo Ruiz (Salt Lake) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Dallas's area.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 37, Free kick Dallas.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas.
Damir Kreilach of Salt Lake smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 40, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Pablo Ruiz (Salt Lake) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Damir Kreilach (Salt Lake) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Sandy.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Dallas at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Dallas needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
Salt Lake's Pablo Ruiz misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Franco Jara (Dallas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Dallas.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 46, Luchi Gonzalez (Dallas) is making a first substitution, with Fafa Picault replacing Jesus Ferreira.
In the minute 47, Alex Chilowicz signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Dallas's half.
Dallas needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Bressan is back on his feet again.
In the minute 49, Bressan is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 50, Dallas's Andres Ricaurte breaks free at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 51, Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Andres Ricaurte for Dallas gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Dallas.
Dallas to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Dallas's half.
Free kick Salt Lake.
In the minute 59, Salt Lake's Nedum Onuoha misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Dallas drives forward and Michael Barrios gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 60, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In Sandy, Fafa Picault (Dallas) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 61, Dallas to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Important block from the Dallas defence as Albert Rusnak fires in a strike for Salt Lake.
Salt Lake's Pablo Ruiz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 62, Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
In Sandy, Ryan Hollingshead of Dallas is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 65, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 69, Justin Meram is on a sub for Douglas Martinez for Salt Lake.
Dallas make their second substitution with Matt Hedges replacing Andres Ricaurte.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Dallas close to the penalty box.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Franco Jara for Dallas has been booked by Alex Chilowicz and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 77, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake are pushing forward but Damir Kreilach's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Maikel Chang with Jeizon Ramirez.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 80, Nick Besler is replacing Pablo Ruiz for the home team.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Salt Lake in Sandy.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 85, Dallas pushes forward through Michael Barrios, whose finish on goal is saved.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
The away team replace Franco Jara with Brandon Servania.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Dallas.
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Dallas.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Sandy.
Free kick Dallas.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
At Rio Tinto Stadium, Jeizon Ramirez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Luchi Gonzalez is making the team's fourth substitution at Rio Tinto Stadium with Ema Twumasi replacing Michael Barrios.
